message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, I believe it would be an invaluable asset to you. I am offering this product to you for $20000.
Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the quality of your product, $20000 is a bit higher than my budget. I'd be willing to pay $12000 for it. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs while still ensuring we receive fair compensation for our product, I am willing to negotiate further. I propose offering the product to you for $14000.
Alice,  $14000 is still a bit more than I'd like to spend.  How about we split the difference and I pay $13000?  I'm really interested in the product but need to stay within my budget.
